member.name: ASF_FLAT_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS
member.summary: Contains synchronized lyrics stored as metadata for a media source. This structure is used as the data item for the WM/Lyrics_Synchronised metadata attribute.

member.name: ASF_FLAT_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS.bTimeStampFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format of time stamps in the lyrics. This member is equivalent to the bTimeStampFormat member in the WM_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS structure. The WM_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS structure is documented in the Windows Media Format SDK.

member.name: ASF_FLAT_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS.bContentType
member.summary: Specifies the type of synchronized strings that are in the lyric data. This member is equivalent to the bContentType member in the WM_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS structure.

member.name: ASF_FLAT_SYNCHRONISED_LYRICS.dwLyricsLen
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the lyric data.
